Package com.example.wizard309.gamestates

Class Playing

java.lang.Object
com.example.wizard309.gamestates.BaseState
com.example.wizard309.gamestates.Playing
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameStatesInterface, WebSocketListener
public class Playing extends BaseState implements GameStatesInterface, WebSocketListener
Playing class The playing class is the core of the overworld game state, this communicates with websockets and gamestateinterface

      public void onWebSocketClose(int code, String reason, boolean remote)

      Specified by:
      onWebSocketClose in interface WebSocketListener
      Parameters:
      code - The status code indicating the reason for closure.
      reason - A human-readable explanation for the closure.
      remote - Indicates whether the closure was initiated by the remote endpoint.
